intent_atoms.description: The ParseIssue model must be tolerant and not halt traversal when corruption events occur.
ParseIssue is implemented as a validation model conforming to Codable, Equatable, Sendable for use across app, CLI, and export layers.
Unit tests cover initializer behavior and JSON round-tripping of ParseIssue.

functional_units.name: ParseIssue Model
functional_units.description: A tolerant parsing issue model capturing severity, code, message, byte range, and node reference for corruption events without halting traversal.
